content.value:
I will not allow this or any other attack on the community to drive me back into the shadows of society. 
Although #oslopride today is now cancelled, I will take every opportunity to show my Pride and fight for tolerance and equality. üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà 
#oslopride #oslove #londonpub
